resources.string: \"Small window\" projects \"Big screen\", mobile phone handles multi-tasks at the same time
Mobile phone becomes \"Handle\", watching the big screen to play games
Please make sure that the devices at both ends are connected to the same LAN May try %1$s switch networks
Unable to connect. Please confirm device
To ensure projection screen quality, it’s suggestion to switch to Wi-Fi of 5G
Select the device for projection screen
When the mobile phone turns on the microphone or we puts on the headset, whether the screen mirroring terminal will always output sound or not?

“Projection screen” will allow you to project mobile phone screen to other terminal devices. To achieve this function, the software will revoke your following mobile phone permissions or functions during usage:

"• Recording: the permission is required to project sound to other terminals. • Camera: when creating links, the permission is required to scan code. • Networking and device identification: when the software is running safety verification at service end, the permission needs to be accessed."

"The setting permissions and functions required by “Projection screen” include the above. If you disagree with our invoking of relevant mobile phone permissions/functions, the software will malfunction. After you agree with it, you will automatically enable the abovementioned permission and you can disable the access to relevant permission in the settings at any time.
If you click on “Agree”, it means that you have read and agreed with above contents."
Need to activate the floating window permission
When using the projection screen, need to activate the permission button that allows it to be displayed on the upper layer of other apps
Please insert DP/HDMI cable to connect for wired screen mirroring

"Step 1: Download Lebo projection screen client from computer end. Step 2: make sure that the mobile phone end and the target device are connected to the same LAN. Step 3: open the QR code of Lebo projection screen client from computer end and scan the QR code to connect with mobile phone end."

"Step 1: Make sure that the mobile phone end and the target device are connected to the same LAN. Step 2: Select “project screen to TV” from mobile phone end and select the device for projection screen in the list of large-screen devices among search results and project screen."
Some large-screen devices cannot be searched. You can try to download and open the Lebo projection screen client on the TV to complete the screen

When on live, it is recommended to use a 3.5mm audio cable to connect the mobile phone and the computer to transmit sound. At the same time, select \"None\" for \"Screen projection sound source\" to ensure that the sound is synchronized with the mobile phone screen.
Mobile games cast PC, live broadcast more enjoyable
Mobile games cast TV, big screen is smoother
Automatically adjust the screen definition according to the network quality
When wireless screen mirroring, current LAN connection status will be real-time displayed.
When wireless screen mirroring, banner notifications, incoming calls and other information will not be displayed on the target device screen.
When wired screen mirroring, banner screen notifications, incoming calls and other information will not be displayed on the target device screen.
Initialization failed, please check wifi connection
You can try to download and open the Lebo projection screen client on the TV.
If there is no target device, you can try to download on TV and open the Lebo projection screen client
Please use it before the screen
Projection screen has been connected. Do you want to enable privacy mode?
Current network status is poor. To ensure the effect of screen projection, it is recommended to use adaptive mode for the screen projection quality.
Go to setting interface and grant permission required by application
"3. Open QR code of Lebo screen project client, scan the code and connect"
(When on live, 3.5mm audio cable is recommended)
"Project screen to PC，Download Lebo projection screen client from computer end"
Screen projection status is real-time displayed, can be off.
Both devices on the screen projection use 5G band Wi-Fi network for better quality.
Both devices on the screen projection use 5G band Wi-Fi network for better quality.
May select different output frame rate modes.
Step 1: One end is a Type-C cable, and the other end may be an HDMI, VGA, DVI or DP adapter cable. (Depending on the interface supported by the large screen device)
Step 2: Use the adapter cable to connect the mobile phone to Type-C, and connect large-screen devices to HDMI, VGA, or DVI.
Step 3: Switch the large-screen input signal source to the input of the adapter cable corresponding to HDMI, VGA, DVI, or DP.
Screen mirroring terminal can display current frame rate.
When the mobile phone turns on the microphone or we puts on the headset, the screen mirroring terminal will always output sound.
"DP/HDMI high-definition zero-latency screen mirroring Up to 165hz with the screen mirroring terminal"
"DP/HDMI high-definition zero-latency screen mirroring Up to 144hz with the screen mirroring terminal"
To ensure better projection screen experience, it’s suggested to install and open Lebo projection screen client on target device through Wi-Fi or code scanning.
